Description: Beautiful 4 bedroom/1.5 bath unit on the second floor in a multi-family house located near (Sutherland St., B line) green line train station in Brighton. Very convenient to Boston College. Less than 5 minutes walking distance to Green line train station, bus lines, restaurants and stores. Unit features a living room and modern kitchen with granite counter-tops and stainless steel appliances. Gleaming hardwood floors throughout. HVAC system. Laundry and storage in the basement. Lot's of On-street parking with a residential permit. Pet Negotiable Street parking with a residential permit.
